title: Software Engineer
description: Develop and maintain software applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products.
rolesAndResp: Write efficient and maintainable code, participate in code reviews, debug and troubleshoot software issues, and contribute to software architecture discussions.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze data to extract valuable insights, build predictive models, and drive data-driven decision-making.
rolesAndResp: Collect and preprocess data, apply statistical analysis and machine learning techniques, create data visualizations, and communicate findings to stakeholders.

title: Network Engineer
description: Design, implement, and maintain network infrastructure to ensure secure and reliable data communication.
rolesAndResp: Configure routers, switches, and firewalls, monitor network performance, troubleshoot connectivity issues, and implement security measures.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Automate and streamline development and operations processes to accelerate software delivery and enhance system reliability.
rolesAndResp: Set up and maintain CI/CD pipelines, manage infrastructure as code, and containerize applications for deployment.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Create user-friendly web interfaces and applications that provide an exceptional user experience.
rolesAndResp: Write clean HTML/CSS code, collaborate with UI/UX designers, develop frontend components, and ensure cross-browser compatibility.
evaluationCriteria: Frontend coding test, UI design review

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protect an organization's systems and data from security threats and breaches.
rolesAndResp: Monitor security alerts, investigate and respond to incidents, conduct vulnerability assessments, and ensure compliance with security policies.

title: Cloud Solutions Architect
description: Design and implement scalable and secure cloud-based solutions for clients to optimize their operations and achieve business goals.
rolesAndResp: Create cloud architectures, provide technical guidance to clients, and ensure cloud services are aligned with business objectives.

title: Database Administrator
description: Manage and optimize databases to ensure efficient data storage, retrieval, and integrity.
rolesAndResp: Administer database systems, perform data backups and restores, monitor database performance, and implement security measures.
evaluationCriteria: Database management task, database performance assessment

title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Develop and implement machine learning and artificial intelligence solutions to solve complex business problems.
rolesAndResp: Collect and preprocess data, build and train machine learning models, evaluate model performance, and deploy AI solutions.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Design and develop blockchain-based solutions for various industries, including finance, supply chain, and healthcare.
rolesAndResp: Write smart contracts, build decentralized applications (DApps), and ensure the security and scalability of blockchain networks.
mandatorySkills: Blockchain Platforms (e.g., Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain)
